summary.span: Windows フォーム コントロールと WPF コントロールの相互運用をサポートするクラスが含まれています。

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名前空間には、と[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]の[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]テクノロジ間の相互運用を可能にするクラスが含まれています。The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. クラスを使用すると、ベースの[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]アプリケーションの[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]ページおよび[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]要素に対してコントロールをホストできます。When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. 相互運用機能を実装する2つの主要なクラスは、とです。The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . 使用するクラスは、コントロールの実装によって異なります。Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - ページ上の[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]コントロールを使用する必要がある場合は、クラスを使用します。 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - ベースのアプリケーションで[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]要素を[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用する必要がある場合は、クラスを使用します。Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
